## StringLocalization interface

Provides api to localize strings

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StringLocalization 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [textsChange](./common.stringlocalization.textschange.md) | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Occurs when indication that locale has changes and strings should be obtained again, because they have changed |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get(key, interpolateParams)](./common.stringlocalization.get.md) | Gets localized string for specified key, interpolation might be used |
